---
# This file is autogenerated
title: sendVerificationCode
description: Overview of the sendVerificationCode method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/wagmi-core/functions/sendVerificationCode
---

Sends a verification code to the specified email or phone number.

This is used to initiate the verification process for updating email or phone number.
After calling this, the user will receive a code via email or SMS which should be
submitted using the updateEmail or updatePhoneNumber actions.

## Import

```ts
import { sendVerificationCode } from "@alchemy/wagmi-core";
```

## Usage

```ts
// Send code to email
await sendVerificationCode(config, {
  contact: "user@example.com",
  type: "email",
});

// Send code to phone
await sendVerificationCode(config, {
  contact: "+15551234567",
  type: "phone",
});
```

## Parameters

### config

`Config`

- The shared Wagmi/Alchemy config

### parameters

`SendVerificationCodeParameters`

- Verification code parameters

### parameters.contact

`string`

- The email address or phone number to send the code to

### parameters.type

`"email" | "phone"`

- The type of contact (email or phone)

## Returns

`Promise<SendVerificationCodeReturnType>`
Promise that resolves when the code is sent
